objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><defs><radialGradient id='grad1' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#2C3E50'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#1E2B3A'/></radialGradient></defs><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><rect x='0' y='200' width='1080' height='1' fill='#E0E0E0'/><rect x='0' y='400' width='1080' height='1' fill='#E0E0E0'/><rect x='0' y='600' width='1080' height='1' fill='#E0E0E0'/><rect x='0' y='800' width='1080' height='1' fill='#E0E0E0'/><rect x='200' y='0' width='1' height='1080' fill='#E0E0E0'/><rect x='400' y='0' width='1' height='1080' fill='#E0E0E0'/><rect x='600' y='0' width='1' height='1080' fill='#E0E0E0'/><rect x='800' y='0' width='1' height='1080' fill='#E0E0E0'/></g><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 L0 0 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.8'/><defs><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#3498DB' stop-opacity='0.1'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#2C3E50' stop-opacity='0.3'/></linearGradient></defs><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='350' fill='url(#grad3)' opacity='0.1'/><defs><radialGradient id='grad3' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFFFFF' stop-opacity='0'/></radialGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text: Active Noise Cancellation • Deep Bass • 24-Hour Battery

product_details.description: Go beyond the beat and take control of the sound that puts you on top of the world with Bose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones. Experience powerful high-fidelity audio with legendary noise cancellation in these wireless Bluetooth headphones that allow you to block everything out but the beat and control what you hear. These Bose wireless headphones feature new custom modes that give you the power to adjust noise cancellation based in the moment and the option to turn on Wind Block to tune out breezy environments. Or simply toggle your Bose over ear headphones between Quiet and Aware Modes for a quick change when the world calls for it. Adjustable EQ puts you in control of tuning your music and Spotify Tap starts your listening session at the push of a button on the side of the over the ear headphones. With up to 24 hours of battery life on a single charge, your Bluetooth headphones are ready for any adventure. Multi-point toggle lets you switch between multiple wireless connections on these around ear headphones without disconnecting and reconnecting each time. Plug in the optional audio cable with in-line microphone into these wireless headphones to make the headphones wired and use without a Bluetooth connection. The Bose Music app guides you through setup, lets you personalize settings, and keeps your headphones software up-to-date. Press play and take charge of your music with Bose QuietComfort Noise Cancelling Headphones. NOISE CANCELLING HEADPHONES: Effortlessly combines noise cancellation technology with passive features so you can shut off the outside world, quiet distractions, and take music beyond the beat COMFORTABLE HEADPHONES: Plush earcup cushions softly hug your ears, while a secure and comfortable padded band gently keeps your over ear headphones in place for those extra-long listening sessions 2 LISTENING MODES: These wireless Bluetooth headphones feature Quiet and Aware Modes that let you toggle between full noise cancelling or full awareness of your surroundings for seamless sound control HIGH-FIDELITY AUDIO/EQ CONTROL: Supercharge your favorite tracks with high-fidelity audio and Adjustable EQ that puts you in control of the bass, mid-range, and treble for unmatched bold sound ALL DAY BATTERY LIFE: Bose QuietComfort wireless headphones provide up to 24 hours of battery on a single charge, plus a 15-minute charge gives you up to 2.5 hours of additional play time WIRED HEADPHONES OPTION: Plug the included audio cable with in-line microphone into your Bose noise cancelling headphones to use them without a Bluetooth connection, or even when the battery is depleted MULTIPOINT BLUETOOTH HEADPHONES: Seamlessly stay connected to all your favorite devices using the multi-point toggle feature which allows you to switch devices without disconnecting and reconnecting each time BOSE APP: Download the Bose app to receive the latest software updates. Ensure optimal functionality and get access to all the latest features and cutting-edge tech. Brand - Bose ** Color - White ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern tech-advertising design with a radial gradient background blending deep navy (#1E2B3A) and slate tones (#2C3E50), enhanced with subtle grid and circle overlays for a digital radar-like look. At the center is a realistic product image layered above the graphic backdrop. The main title (`heading`) boasts bold typography in white, followed by a subheading (`subheading`) in sleek light-blue sans-serif font (#7CB9E8), highlighting the key product feature. Beneath the product, a description text block (`description`) is displayed in soft grey. The price text (`price`) is bold and prominent in light-blue, directly above a rounded rectangular CTA button (`cta_button`) in sky blue (#3498DB) with white CTA label (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Navy: #1E2B3A  
- Slate: #2C3E50  
- Light Blue: #7CB9E8  
- Sky Blue: #3498DB  
- Soft Grey: #E0E0E0  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases sleek Bose over-ear headphones primarily in a soft, matte white finish that exudes minimalism and modern elegance. The color palette includes soft pearl white (#EDE9E4), light silver-gray (#D6D3CE), and subtle chrome accents (#BFC1C0). The branding on the earcups features a gentle gradient sheen blending silver-gray (#C4C4C4) to white, adding a premium metallic touch. These hues blend seamlessly while maintaining enough contrast to highlight the contours and premium build. For an advertisement banner, pairing these colors with cool, calming backgrounds like ice blue (#E8F0F3) or muted taupe (#CABEB7) can emphasize the product's refined, high-end appeal.
